body:
I started encountering really a weird issue while building paraview (using the package from develop, which previous worked fined).

Everything progresses fine until the link stage, at which point spack is passing through a really weird rpath that fails:

    -rpath,/tmp/mark/spack-stage/spack-stage-vMgFh5/ParaView-v5.3.0/spack-build/lib:::::::::  ../../../lib/libvtksys-pv5.3.so.1 -lpthread -ldl

Note that the `::::::::` junk is actually about 4000 chars long, I just chopped it for display purposes.
title: paraview build failure - weird rpath
